QuestData.Title: WANTED: Rindlewoe
QuestData.Description:
A monstrous beast of wood and flesh has been terrorizing the nearby river territories.
If any adventurers are brave enough to vanquish this beast, the town of Fallhaven would gratefully proffer a reward.
Please report to Mayor White if you wish to help.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A monstrous construct, powered by dark magic.
QuestData.RewardText:
The beast has been slain? You have my thanks, $c.
Here is your reward, as promised.
